name: Apple
description: An apple a day keeps the doctor away!

name: Arrow
description: Can be attached to the crossbow.

name: Heart Arrow
description: A love-themed arrow that will have your targets seeing hearts!

name: Lightbulb Arrow
description: An arrow that illuminates the surrounding area.

name: Backpack
description: The perfect adventurers pack. Has a base capacity of 10 items.

description: The perfect adventurers pack. Has a base capacity of 10 items. Now in a stylish Black!

description: A massive pack with an extended capacity. Has a base capacity of 20 items.

name: Balloon
description: A tool that helps you defy gravity...but not too much.

name: Heart Balloon
description: Heart shaped balloon! For when love has you floating on air!

name: Banana
description: Go bananas! Turn this in for Nuts.

description: A weapon that's great for hitting monsters out of the park.

description: Much more valuable than a little cup. Turn it in for Nuts.

description: Carry this device around for vibes on the go!

name: Calculator
description: Helpful for number crunching

description: A box... but you get this sudden urge to hide beneath it.

description: Nothing beats cold, hard cash.

description: The only thing that beats a pile of cash.

description: The only thing that beats cold hard cash.

name: Clapper
description: Lights, camera, action!

description: One grenade, multiple explosions. It’s like a fireworks show but with more danger.

name: Cola
description: Bubbly sugar water. Turn this in for Nuts.

description: The regular size cola wasn't enough. Turn this in for Nuts.

description: Experimental sustenance. Eat for a boost in productivity. May have side effects.

description: Optimized for survival. Contents undisclosed.

description: Some dry biscuits that would pair well with soup.

name: Crate

name: DVD

description: A digital camera. Take pictures of monsters and sell the camera for profit.

description: For when subtlety just isn't an option. Light the fuse and throw!

name: Egg
description: Beware its mother. Turn this in for Nuts.

description: Blind and deafen your enemies with an explosion and flash of bright light!
